pageContext.description: Mr. Hughes would not leave it in Dec. 1983.
pageContext.collection: Hughes, Mr. Paul V. - private (1983),6 Fernwood Close, St. Ives, Ringwood, Hants, BH24 2NQ
pageContext.site: Dorset,River Stour,below Crawford Bridge,(Parishes: Shopwick/Stuminster Marshall),Mr Hughes purchased it in May 83 from an old gentleman whose house he was working on; the gentleman (whose name was apparently not known) was not particularly forthcoming with information, but eventually disclosed that it was found about eight years earlier (ie, 1975) c. 1/2 mile below Crawford Bridge - he did not pinpoint the spot, but mentioned an island possible that of ST926019; the chap was working for the waterboard and dredging across the river with bucket. Probably cutting only a few feet into riverbed.
pageContext.toSearch: Crawford Bridge Crossroads (se-bound), Blandford Forum, Dorset Dt11, UK
pageContext.remarks: PRBAF: Zerox + illus + photo in DF; DF(S); SI; RSO 28/12/83; CI; SN Fwb 84; Source Sb. I,Sub. Inf.: Hughes
